p: To test the regurgitates from the seed‐identity experiments for the presence of plant DNA, all samples were screened with the general plant primers “ g A49425” and “ d B49863” (Taberlet et al., 2007). They amplify a 300‐bp fragment from the trnL exon, a recommended size for dietary studies (Greenstone, Payton, Weber, & Simmons, 2014). The PCR assay and conditions followed the description provided in Wallinger et al. ( 2013).
